callback_with_context.context_function_id: Component("756AD0ED-D7F6-4CAF-AB1AB64785D8B0D3").Close #use the close of the events callback
Try(RequiresResponse == false && IsContextValid( IconContext ) == false) # we are assuming that if there is no link arrow we need to show the close button
(Layout != "dilemma" || IsRead) && IsLargeIncident == false && (Layout == "mission" && CustomContext.MissionContext.Completed && CampaignRoot.IsPrologue) == false

newstate.name: NewState
newstate.text: Cavaleiros do Torno Fulgurante (Esmagadores de Cranios de Khorne)

property.name: mission_review
property.value: Layout == "mission" && (IsRead == true || CustomContext.MissionContext.Completed == false || CampaignRoot.IsPrologue == false)

property.name: standard
property.value: true #fallback layout must always be the last in the child list

expired.name: expired
expired.text: This follower has departed and will no longer be of service to you.

full.name: full
full.text: This character already has a full household:

stolen.name: stolen
stolen.text: In the mayhem of the battle, this character's equipment was stolen by the enemy!

newstate.name: NewState
newstate.text: This item or follower is ready to be assigned to a character of your choosing.

agent.comment: The agent needs to be separate as otherwise the callbacks that set image will conflict when there's multiple recruitment events, which will make the unit show with agent image

newstate.name: NewState
newstate.text: This item or follower is ready to be assigned to a character of your choosing.

dy_details_text.comment: used if the text is smaller than the dy_details_slider textview

agent.comment: The agent needs to be separate as otherwise the callbacks that set image will conflict when there's multiple recruitment events, which will make the unit show with agent image
